text: The following lists events that have happened in 1804 in the Qajar dynasty. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Fat′h-Ali Shah Qajar ==Events== * Battle of Ganja (1804) * Russo-Persian War (1804–13) begins. ==References== Persia Category:Years of the 19th century in Iran Category:1800s in Iran Persia
title: 1804 in Iran
